website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use, bright and soft mat that is a nice size for helping keep the floors clean during baby's meal.
pros: Back has an anti-slip covering to help keep the mat in place
Can double as a table cloth
Big enough to catch all the food baby throws on the floor
cons: This cloth is water-resistant, but not waterproof
If you do not wipe up liquids, they can soak through

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof mat
customer_reviews.text: If you have carpet, the mat will help with stain from solid food and you can wipe off the stain. However if you spill liquid on the mat, it will go right through the mat within 5 mins and will wet your carpet/floor. So it’s not waterproof for sure. It’s not laminated mat. The mat bounces up all the time (annoying). Please make sure nobody slips on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: if you are debating whether to buy it or not, BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: We debated on buying this for months, and when we finally did, I should have bought it earlier. It's amazing quality, easy to clean, and makes our lives SO MUCH EASIER. We used to scrub our floor every night multiple times due to our wonderful baby throwing food everywhere... now we just pick up the mat, put the food crumbs in the trash, and drop the mat in the laundry every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Splat Mat
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the floor clean, plenty of room to go under our high chair, and I love the relatively neutral pattern. I have some concerns that-- over time-- the cloth will eventually stain, but that's the price you pay for having a cloth-type mat instead of just a piece of plastic. I'm okay replacing it later if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Willie V. HughesTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Works for twins!
customer_reviews.text: Since this mat is extra large it works for sitting under our twin high chairs (facing each other). Although it doesn’t catch all the flung spoons and foods, I think it has really helped reduce how sticky our floor is around the chairs. The light color makes it easier to see spills (our floors are dark). And it’s easy to clean! It’s easy to wipe but since it is a little pourus it can need a little elbow grease if you miss a spot that dried hard.
customer_reviews.author: melissa w.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this mat!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this ten stars if I could. I have cherry colored pergo floors. My daughter leaves water spots everywhere when she drops her water cup from her high chair. She is also a messy eater. This mat catches all of that. It’s also waterproof and machine washable. I just shake it outside. I’ve washed it a few times and it is in perfect condition. It is non-slip too.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: This would be good if you had carpet otherwise it just makes it harder to clean. You have to pick up the whole large pad and try to rinse it instead of a quick vacuum and wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Boris

customer_reviews.title: Makes for easy clean up!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re like me and don’t have a dog to clean up your baby’s food messes off the floor, then this splat mat is for you! I love this thing, it’s cute and it’s a decent size, and it grips to the floor so it doesn’t slide around. Much better than having to wipe up the floor after every meal because my child always throws his food in the floor when he’s done.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Work great for me
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what it says. It's bigger than I expected but the highchair rolls on it and it stays pretty good (as good as one could expect) plus it's cute and cleans easily. I also like that you can wash it as some of the others get ruined in the wash so I like to be able to wipe it down and wash it every week/every other depending.
customer_reviews.author: katie m.

customer_reviews.title: Waterproofing disappeared after I washed it
customer_reviews.text: I originally received a splat mat where the water resistance disappeared after washing, which should not occur. However the seller was super proactive in helping to remedy the situation - sending me a completely new mat. I am super happy with this second splat mat! Does what I need and it looks great doing it! Life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H.

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for Twins
customer_reviews.text: This has been awesome for us. No matter how quick I was to clean up spilled food stuff always got stuck on the floor. With these I just wash every few days. We've had these over a month and have washed them at least a dozen times and they seem brand new still. The size is great, we can fit both of my twins high chairs on this. Must have for people who hate sticky floors or cleaning floors often.
customer_reviews.author: Twincess Mama

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I have never gotten a product like this before, but I am pregnant with my third baby and decided to put a high chair mat on my registry, because we've moved to a house with wooden floors and use a nice rug under our kitchen table. This met feels so sturdy. I really appreciate the non-slip dots on the back, and it's thick enough that I know it will protect my floors. Also love the generous size. I'll be using this with my older kids for crafts, and for the high chair when my baby is a few months old. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Great mat.
customer_reviews.text: I use this mat under a table and chair set that I have for my granddaughter. She eats at this table and does arts and crafts at it as well. The mat is a great catch-all when placed under the table. It washes and drys remarkably well too.
customer_reviews.author: TRA1983

customer_reviews.title: Just throw away your $20 now.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this isn't waterproof. I got this to put under my rabbit's enclosure because she loves to dump over her water bowl. She isn't a chewer and there are no holes, the water just goes straight through it and onto the floor. It isn't easy to clean, she peed on it a couple times and that also soaked through. The material is thin and whatever coating is on the top might be adequate for say a finch that likes to splash water droplets, but that's about it. I used it for a week and I just threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Andreya

customer_reviews.title: perfect for crafts, cooking, making messes
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for everything but under a highchair. It's easy to clean, I just throw it in the washer and dry it on low. It's the same size as my wooden dining table, so I've used it for crafts, making pasta, wrapping gifts, etc. It's the perfect surface for "doing things" on. I used it to cover an outdoor picnic table once. I love the star pattern, it's modern, fun, and unobtrusive. It's grippy, but won't damage surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: see jane read

customer_reviews.title: Versatile spill cloth for toddlers as well as babies
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a second one of these. When my daughter was younger, I used it as intended and had it under her high chair. Since it’s basically a water resistant cloth, I now keep one under her craft table to protect my floors from markers/paint and keep one covering our upholstered chair that has her booster on it. I throw it in the wash once a week or two and let it air dry. I do recommend removing it right away if they spill something with a lot of liquid so it doesn’t go through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should've Bought This a While Ago!
customer_reviews.text: I should've bought this waaaayyyy earlier. Glad I have it now. I was using a blanket to catch messes thinking it was good enough. Oils, sauces, and liquids were finding their way to the carpet with that method. It's the perfect size for my messy 2 year old daughter who loves to drop utensils and cup when she's done eating. Liquid doesn't seep thru. Dried on food practically peels off. I've washed this thing over 10 times now and it still looks new. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Makes Life Easier
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this and wish I did sooner! It is waterproof and covers enough area to protect the floor from dropped food. I plan on using this for messy arts and crafts when my little one is older. I love how you can just throw it in the washer when it's dirty and it air dries very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: Caution that this is water RESISTANT, not water proof. My daughter dropped her sippy cup, which knocked the lid askew and water leaked out. I didn’t know it was spilling, and worse that it was soaking through the mat onto my hardwood floors. The whole point of the mat is to protect the floor. So now, I’m going to rebuy one that’s water proof. It’s too bad because I had love this mat up until I found this out. It’s big, lightweight, easy to clean, and neutral pattern/color. Checked all the boxes except an really important one.
customer_reviews.author: Pinguino

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: A tablecloth would work about as well. :( Edges flip up and are tripped on. Mashed banana is actually easier to clean up off the hardwood vs this thing. Maybe if you have carpet it works better? It seemed like a good idea....but didn’t work out. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: michaelsean

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for keeping messes off my carpet. I used a little bit of carpet tape on the corners and edges to keep it in place. I have only had this a few days so I have not washed it yet and cannot comment on durability. It does, however, seem nice and durable The fabric is not thin and flimsy. I will update my review if it does not hold up. Overall, i would recommend this to anyone who has a messy child and a floor to save.
customer_reviews.author: AshCakes

customer_reviews.title: Love the mat!
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate the extended coverage of this mat. We had a different one, but the baby kept throwing food past it and onto the wood floor. My husband loves that this mat covers much more than the standard size mats out there, thus saving his precious hardwoods from the scourge of toddler mealtimes. The underside has non-slip rubbery stuff on it, which is helpful in stopping the baby from slipping on it when he is running around.
customer_reviews.author: Morrigan

customer_reviews.title: Nope 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: I’m not fond of this. When it said it was a mat, I pictured it being a mat. But it’s not a mat, it’s a water resistant piece of fabric. So it is forever getting bunched up under the high chair and stuff. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Gavin

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for any toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the best purchases I’ve made for my toddlers constant meal messes. This thing has saved my carpet so many times! It’s super durable, and I’ve machined washed it multiple times and it’s holding up nicely. Very good construction and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Mills

customer_reviews.title: BIG sturdy splat mat
customer_reviews.text: My first impression after taking this out of the box was that it was HUGE. I considered sending it back, but decided against it...which I’m so glad I did!!! Our son is a thrower and this mat has saved our wood floors! I have noticed that juices do stain the mat, and the only way to get it off is to throw it in the washer. I do wish it was easier to wipe away messes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Better to just sweep the floor
customer_reviews.text: The bottom part does not slip on hardwood floors but the top piece is not sewn to the bottom (kind of like a pillow case but enclosed on all sides) so the top part moves and pulls up the bottom. Kept it and may use for picnics
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this if you need the surface below to be kept dry it is NOT waterproof. It is also two separate layers so it slips and bunches on itself easily. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this when my daughter play with Play Doh. I just put her on the floor with it. Saves me a good 20 min of cleaning. So worth the money.. seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product - not so "anti-slip"
customer_reviews.text: The size, pattern, and color of the mat are all perfect and just as described. Its also easy to clean. It does the job just fine, but the back "anti-slip" isn't quite accurate. The rubber dots on the back create some resistance and grip, like you'll notice that they're there, but it still moves really easily. So if that's a big priority for you, maybe keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Minty Minion

customer_reviews.title: #dogmom
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my puppy’s little playpen! I wanted something waterproof in case he missed the potty pad. It worked so well, I ordered two more. So easy to clean up little messes. Easy to wash and it air dries fast! If it can hold up for a demon puppy, I am sure it works even better with kids!
customer_reviews.author: chandell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, and put away.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the baby to roll around on for a couple of months, now it's under the high chair. Super easy to wipe down, fold up and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Madron

customer_reviews.title: Love this splash mat
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for us to use at our house when our grand baby came to visit. Loved it so much, we bought one for our daughter’s house. Love that it’s Machine Washable. Wish we could put it in the dryer, but it dies dry pretty quickly when hanging. It doesn’t stick to the floor so be careful to not trip over it.
customer_reviews.author: B Brock

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat!
customer_reviews.text: We love this mat. We place it under our toddler grandson's high chair or booster seat when he eats, and it's large enough to catch everything he drops or spills. Also like that the under side of it is slip-resistant to keep grandparents from sliding on it. After machine washing and drying, it still looks brand new. Can't speak yet for long-time durability, but all indications are that it will hold up for multiple grandchildren!
customer_reviews.author: spry old girl

customer_reviews.title: Sanity saver!! Perfect size! Such a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: My second child loves to drop food on the ground onto our nice hardwood floors. The clean up was getting out of control. This May has saved my sanity. I simply pick it up at the end of the day and either shake outside or over the trash depending on the amount of food dropped. Cleans up great in the wash. I’m so glad I picked this brand because it’s a larger size than most. The other mats would be way too small. This one provides great coverage. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan V

customer_reviews.title: Baby even likes it
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment with carpet and this spill mat is perfect after having my son! Its light weight, super easy to clean and it stays where i put it. Every time i lay it down to get ready to feed my son he will crawl so fast onto it and just lay or smack it. Definitely 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna Brasil

customer_reviews.title: Excellent size, great durability
customer_reviews.text: As you know, a baby in a fit can throw their food a pretty long way. Although this mat won’t catch a Hail Mary, it sure does a good job saving your floors from all the glop that falls or is dropped. It really is a good size, it easily wipes clean and folds neatly for storage
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ratcliffe

customer_reviews.title: High quality materials, nice design
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, despite is made of fabric, it does not absorbs immediately, that gives you some time to clean any liquids before you get a stain, size is nice and design is cute, I wish they have more designs, I could use another one for my baby's bedroom
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: When I read that it is waterproof (water resistant), I thought that it would be proofed for smoothies and will be easy to clean. But I was wrong. It isn’t easy to clean after smoothies plus it stains. Now I don’t know how to get rid of the stains from this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Mariya Jensikbayeva

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for under the booster seat the the dining table or under the high chair. Also can be used when doing arts and crafts under an activity table. Machine washable and I lay flat to dry. This will be used several years because it is so durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slip, slide and crumple
customer_reviews.text: This splat mat is not at all what I expected. It slides and crumples up like a blanket preventing it from doing its job. In addition, we had a spill on it and it went right through and stained my carpet. It's so aggravating to clean up after meal time, again because it slips all over the place making it close to impossible to sweep or dust buster up any mess. I can't believe I spent $30 on this!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work out
customer_reviews.text: I have to discard the mat because after a month of use, it has become the most stinky thing in my home. It looks easy to clean but the smell gets into the mat and can’t be eliminated.
customer_reviews.author: jolie

customer_reviews.title: Effective Mat!
customer_reviews.text: I use this mat for under my daughters high chair as well as our backyard for grass play. I love it! Keeps my wood floors safe. I don’t find it particularly easy to clean on a daily basis, rather I wash it with my laundry and then air dry it. I’ll repurchase in the future if I need to
customer_reviews.author: modupe adeleye

customer_reviews.title: Simple mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat is easy to clean, just put it in the washing machine. However it is a little large for our space, we end up folding part of it up. So pay attention to the size if you are trying to fit a certain space. Not easy to vacuum, as the vacuum just sucks up the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great every day mat
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality mat. We use this under our Tripp Trapp high chair. It’s a great size and catches most of the food that gets dropped or thrown on the floor. The bottom of this mat has a sticky grip and the mat itself has a nice weight to it which is really nice for keeping the mat flat on the ground while sliding the high chair over it. I throw this mat into the wash for a quick 15 min speed wash at the end of the day and hang to dry overnight. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jean L

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mat! I use it under my rabbit cage as a play mat for him and it is fantastic. He makes messes and my hardwood floors are safe and clean! Best part, I just throw it in the washing machine and it's just like new. Had it a year now and it has completely held up. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: High chair mat
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair mat. It’s great for the spills and food tosses the baby throws. love the pattern and the baby loves the dinosaurs and trees. Very easy to clean and saves me from washing the floor every day. Our baby is a year old💕
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Not water resistant at all. First day we had it water spilled on it and soaked right through without repelling basically any.
customer_reviews.author: Lane C

customer_reviews.title: Good but stains easily
customer_reviews.text: Stained with pasta sauce and strawberries despite washing it many times. It also shrunk in the dryer so don’t dry even just using air I’m not sure why it got smaller but it did. It is easy and covienent to shake off after meal times and my messy toddler though!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I originally was excited about this product but after a couple of months of using it I removed it as it was quite pointless. It moves too much and doesnt grip well on hardwood floors. It also stains very easily. I would wash this almost every week and the stains do not come out. I took it out and would just rather sweep.
customer_reviews.author: E. Shabtai

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for baby food mess
customer_reviews.text: My baby just got to solid food age and we have carpet throughout so this is perfect solution. Baby can have fun eating and we don’t need to worry about staining the carpet. It’s very well made, i thought it would be thin and kinda like a shower curtain but it appears thicker and a lot more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn.D

customer_reviews.title: This does not stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of the product but unfortunately the mat cloth and the rubber at the back is just stitched to each other at the borders therefore the upper cloth keeps on moving and my little one slipped while running on it. We tried it on wood on aclean surface but against the product description, it kept on bunching. I would rather buy a transparent thick plastic one that practically sticks to a surface better than this. Returning this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not help with messes
customer_reviews.text: I used this mat for under my babies high chair and it never lays flat! It is cut and sewn all wrong. The grippy layer of the mat on the bottom is smaller than the top layer so the mat never lays flat. I can't roll the high chair over it with out getting all kinds of rolls and folds. Not happy at all with this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Hasselschwert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect floor mat...
customer_reviews.text: Compared to what I had when my girls were babies..this is GREAT! ..nice large size, cute decor on it..and an excellent rubber backing to keep it from moving..can be used under high chair or just as a mat for the child to play and eat on.
customer_reviews.author: great gift

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put underneath the high chair but it was more of a hastle to clean this mat. We actually use it outside under my daughters water table! It’s perfect under that for her to stand on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carpet saver!
customer_reviews.text: So far this mat had prevented several messes in the carpet. It is durable and still looks new after several washes. It is a larger size and is recommended as most things dont fall straight down from a high chair.
customer_reviews.author: rockandroll

customer_reviews.title: Not really useful when you consider its flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and non slip but I was expecting it to be easier to wipe down. The top is more like a cloth fabric than a laminate so it’s just as difficult (if not more difficult) to clean than the kitchen floor. Also, whilst it has a non slip backing, the ensues come up quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Good weight to it so it stays down and highchair can roll easily on or off. Easy clean in the washer. Will be a great drop cloth paint mat when the babies are older too!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The mat is a great size for catching food and easy to shake into garbage. I washed it today and am disappointed it can't be put in the dryer. I need to use this everyday and not be waiting for it to air dry.
customer_reviews.author: LJH

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase a special piece of cloth for my infant to drop food onto. I am so glad I did. Large, liquid repellant, non-skid, and washable, this is the perfect splat mat. I had theirs shower curtains, sheet plastic, towels, and other attempted solutions. Short of acquiring a dog this has been the best purchase in keeping my kitchen clean since baby (now toddler) started eating solids.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: Great material! Washes well! For us it was a little big for our small kitchen and under her high chair, but we love using it for art projects in the living room and for picnics in the yard. Oh, and our daughter loves the darling characters on it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Washable
customer_reviews.text: I love that this mat is washable and folds down to a pretty small size. It does stain, but I guess that doesn't really matter as long as my floor doesn't!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought the splat mat for my grandson’s visit It is washable and very large. My son was so impressed he thought he’d get one for hisa house!
customer_reviews.author: picky consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping floor clean
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Makes clean up easier at meal time. Washed on delicate with just a little soap and hung it to dry. Will use this for crafting and painting when done
customer_reviews.author: Aundrea N.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this mat is better than I expected. I was very pleasantly surprised! I almost bought the cheaper one, the one with the pattern not straight at the bottom. Knowing that would drive me nuts, I got this one instead. Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Dresher

customer_reviews.title: Not Food Wipeable
customer_reviews.text: Expected to be able to wipe baby food messes from this mat, but it pretty much just stains it and looks terrible. Yes it protects the rug and floor but really not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I recommend
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a dumb thing to have but it has proven to be very practical. This helps keepy floors clean. After dinner we just pick up carefully and shake at the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love that its machine washable. It beads liquid when spilled on. Rubber sticky grips on bottom perfect for our wood floor. Nice size. Majority of droppings land on this mat making cleanup of a 1 year old a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M

customer_reviews.title: The mat does not stick even in wood floors
customer_reviews.text: The mat kept being dragged with the highchair, and it would not stick flat to the ground and is not anti-slip at all. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: I love that food doesn't stick on the mat and it is easy to clean up. It sticks on the floor pretty good that I can sweep over it. The mat is a good size too. I place the high chair right in the center and it catches all the food that my baby throws.
customer_reviews.author: trix12pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great as a top layer
customer_reviews.text: This playmat is very thin and great as a foldable/unfold top mat. Easy to clean and put away. Great to take out and put as a cover for the foam mat underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Truese

customer_reviews.title: Washes well- but loses it's grip
customer_reviews.text: This mat is a good size under our high chair. It catches most of the food. It cleans really well but once we put it in the washing machine, it lost it's stickiness and won't stick to the floor as well.
customer_reviews.author: Drocks27

customer_reviews.title: Skids and poses a tripping hazard
customer_reviews.text: Skids under the chair and poses a tripping hazard while walking across the mat. Doesnt work on both carpets and hardfloor. Waste if money.
customer_reviews.author: Yeswekay

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it promises. Good size- I wouldn’t go any smaller than this. I throw it in the wash and hang dry it. Much better than scrubbing the floor
customer_reviews.author: Coraline

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Its very thin and lightweight. I was expecting something heavier and waterproof to protect my floors under my baby’s high chair. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Merima

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Keeps floor clean and dry. Stands up to plates and bowls dropped on it and an 85 lb dog walking all over it looking for scraps. If you like the way it looks, buy it. It does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Glass

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Ended up using this for muddy dogs that needed their paws cleaned. Works great and it's durable. It goes through the wash no problem.
customer_reviews.author: FrickandMab

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! I hated cleaning the floor after every meal, so this makes it much easier! It is big enough to catch majority of the food that our daughter throws off! And I throw it in the wash a few times a week! Very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Williams

customer_reviews.title: great for arts and crafts
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my daughter to do arts and crafts. It keeps the mess contained and not all over my floor
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Not that we had our doubts with this but it came better than expected! Bigger than I thought but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Harris

customer_reviews.title: Stains easily
customer_reviews.text: It stains very easily. I'm disappointed because it looks so bad and we've only had it a week and nothing will clean the stains out.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! It is such a large mat that all of the floor surrounding my son's high chair is still covered. Easy to clean. Easy to fold up to store. Very affordable. Love the color and design. It really makes life easier after meals for clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for under the high chair and for playtime. I wash in the washing machine with towels and it’s good as new. Would buy again. Update: I took away two stars because this mat is NOT water resistant. Water seeped right through it. So bummed.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Protects well!
customer_reviews.text: Once our baby got older, we begun to use this mat to protect a light color cloth ottoman, in the playroom. This material held well overtime and is liquid resistant. We highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taliaaa

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product- easy to clean and it’s a good size for when food is being thrown across the room by your toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product if on the right floor
customer_reviews.text: I have mine on carpet so it doesn’t stay down and I have ended up not using it but it would be nice on tile! Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: good useful splat mat
customer_reviews.text: I bough this mat for my baby eatting chair. this one easy to use and clear. Now don't worry the soup drop to the splat. And this mat is huge, i like it
customer_reviews.author: lujiayue

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for toddlers learning to eat
customer_reviews.text: It has helped save the carpet of a lot of spills!! Happy to have it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisetta

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I got it for a puppy as an extra protection layer for the floor. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jackiepants

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose but the biggest thing I’m Dissatisfied with is it does not hold in place under the highchair. If it stayed in place I would rate it a five
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great size for under an easel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old as a mat under her easel. Perfect size and cute too. I haven't had to clean it yet, but looks like it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Not PERFECT. Had a bunny take a leak on it (tmi but is dark and acidic if its relevent) and it is still semi stained. Otherwise, works great! Is just a light rolled mat, is not thicker solid or thicker : carpet" style
customer_reviews.author: sierra

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a little larger
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item in hopes that it would help keep the area that we keep our highchair clean when our son eats. We found that it isn’t quite large enough and we still have food that ends up on the floor. It is very easy to clean and it is convenient that it can be moved around. I wish it was larger and covered more surface area.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Floor saver!
customer_reviews.text: I run a small child care from my home and I got this to put around my art area it's perfect easily washable
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just be warned if you have a cat the cat will attack it but it does it’s job even on carpet
customer_reviews.author: Houdini

customer_reviews.title: Mostly awesome
customer_reviews.text: Mostly awesome, but you have to wipe spills off it within seconds to keep them from staining.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Machine washable/dry!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! It resists water. I use it in my puppy’s pen I love how well it washes and dries!!
customer_reviews.author: esther

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Using under puppy playpen to protect my floors. It is working great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn B

customer_reviews.title: Floor saver, easy toddler clean up
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat. It’s perfect for under my sons highchair. I don’t have to worry about the floor getting dirty or damaged. It stays in place good. And is easy to broom crumb off and I even mopped the top to clean it which worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: helps
customer_reviews.text: Help keep your section clean and I give the leftovers to the dogs LOL
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Bunny mat approved.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to place under my bunnys cage. It has held up amazingly. Its easy to sweep up any hay or food. The mat has a grippy bottom and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: 🌈🦋Nancy 🦋💕

customer_reviews.title: Used as a small play mat for crafts
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this as a play doh mat to protect the carpet in my daughters room. It’s amazing such an easy clean up and it’s perfect size for her to play on. Super happy with my purchase. I definitely recommend. The play doh for the most part doesn’t stick to the mat which is also great.
customer_reviews.author: gissele

product_meta.title: Splat Mat for Under Highchair/Arts/Crafts, Wo Baby Reusable Waterproof Anti-Slip Floor Splash Mat, Portable Play Mat and Table Cover (51", Seaworld)
product_meta.description:
Color:Undersea World Description:
Wo Baby latest splat mat is an all-in-one multi-purpose mat. 
It catches daily mealtime&playtime crumbs and protects your floors from constant cleaning.
It also can be used as a table cover and portable activity mat play mat. 

Its advantages:
1) High quality, durable and safe material for babies. 
2) Pretty Patterns, Kids will love it.
3) Washable and reusable.
4) WaterProof, easily wipe away mess by damp cloth. 
5) Anti-Slip, keep the mat in place.
6) 51"x51" big size. 

Package Included:
1 x Multipurpose Splat Mat
feature_bullets: SAFE MATERIAL – 100% polyester, lead free, BPA free and phthalate free.
WATERPROOF SPLASH MAT – Our highchair mat is waterproof and easy to clean, most food and mess can be shaken off or wiped away with a damp cloth.
NON SLIP SPILL MAT – Back fabric is with anti-slip silicone dot, keep the high chair floor mat in place, not easy to bunch up under high chair or on hardwood floor.
WASHABLE MESS MAT SIZE – 51"x51", big enough to cover the area you want, and 1.2 pounds lightweight is ideal for travel.
MULTIPLE USES -- It can be used as a splat mat, or a picnic mat at a park, as a table cover for play time, and just anyway or anywhere you need that extra protection.
